PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文心灵提升大善传达追求光明飘逸自在,2012年到底会发生什么(4)太阳系的变化(三)... 在未来10年的某个时候,它会跨越一个叫做太阳驻点(Heliopause) [注:太阳粒子.
“旅行者1号“测量到银河系宇宙射线显著增长，预示着飞出太阳系时刻的来临。这被视为“旅行者1号“已经穿越太阳风层顶（heliopause）的信号，在这里由太阳风发出的带电粒子形成了等离子气泡。
图文附注②日鞘(Heliosheath):终端激波和日球层顶之间的区域。附注③日球层顶(Heliopause):太阳风完全减速至零的边界。附注④(可能存在的)弓形激波(Bow shock):星际.
...太阳风的速度降为亚音速之处称为终端激波,与星际物质达到平衡之处称为太阳层顶,heliopause,星际物质,以相反的方向运动,与太阳圈碰撞使得速度降至亚音速之处,会产生弓形激波,

encyclopedia.content: heliopause 太阳驻点 有关太阳的某个“点”，太阳风在此遭遇星际物质。

means.word_mean: 1. the boundary marking the edge of the sun's influence; the boundary (roughly 100 AU from the sun) between the interplanetary medium and the interstellar medium; where the solar wind and the wind from other stars meet

auth_sentence.content: We have never been near the heliopause before.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have never been near the heliopause before.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have never been near the heliopause before.

auth_sentence.content: At some unknown point they'll cross the heliopause, defined as the final limit of the Solar System.
auth_sentence.res_content: At some unknown point they'll cross the heliopause, defined as the final limit of the Solar System.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: At some unknown point they'll cross the heliopause, defined as the final limit of the Solar System.
